means: 出生、订婚、结婚和死亡栏
孵化( hatch的第三人称单数 )
使（小鸟、小鱼、小虫等）孵出

sentence.Network_en: All deck fittings, windows, hatches and doors had been fastened.
sentence.Network_cn: 甲板上所有的装置、窗户、舱口盖和门都已经关牢了。

sentence.Network_en: Each of these eggs hatches out into a tiny grub.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些虫卵中的每一个都将孵化出一条小幼虫.

sentence.Network_en: The larva hatches out and lives in the soil.
sentence.Network_cn: 幼虫孵化之后就在土壤里生活.

entry.def: When a baby bird, insect, or other animal hatches, or when it is hatched, it comes out of its egg by breaking the shell.

example.ex: As soon as the two chicks hatch, they leave the nest burrow...
example.tran: 两只小鸟一出壳就离开了巢穴。

example.ex: The young disappeared soon after they were hatched.
example.tran: 雏鸟出壳后不久就不见了。

entry.def: When an egg hatches or when a bird, insect, or other animal hatches an egg, the egg breaks open and a baby comes out.

example.ex: The eggs hatch after a week or ten days...
During these periods the birds will lie on the cage floor as if trying to lay or hatch eggs.
example.tran: 这些时期，鸟儿会趴在笼底，好像在下蛋或孵蛋。

entry.def: If you hatch a plot or a scheme, you think of it and work it out.

example.ex: He has accused opposition parties of hatching a plot to assassinate the Pope.
example.tran: 他指控反对党密谋暗杀教皇。

entry.def: A hatch is an opening in the deck of a ship, through which people or cargo can go. You can also refer to the door of this opening as a hatch.

example.ex: He stuck his head up through the hatch...
All deck fittings, windows, hatches and doors had been fastened.
example.tran: 甲板上所有的装置、窗户、舱口盖和门都已经关牢了。

entry.tran: （墙上或屋顶的）小窗口;（尤指厨房和餐厅间传递菜肴等的）小窗口，传菜口
entry.def: A hatch is an opening in a ceiling or a wall, especially between a kitchen and a dining room, which you can pass something such as food through.

entry.tran: 做好准备（迎接挑战）；未雨绸缪
entry.def: If someone battens down the hatches, they prepare themselves so that they will be able to survive a coming difficulty or crisis.

example.ex: Many firms are battening down the hatches and preparing to ride out the storm.
example.tran: 很多公司正在加紧准备，希望能挺过这场暴风雨。

auth_sentence.content: He became embattled and mentally battened down the hatches.
auth_sentence.res_content: He became embattled and mentally battened down the hatches.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He became embattled and mentally battened down the hatches.

auth_sentence.content: The little fish hatches out and wriggles free.
auth_sentence.res_content: The little fish hatches out and wriggles free.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The little fish hatches out and wriggles free.

auth_sentence.content: Two hybrids from the same parent but from different hatches.
auth_sentence.res_content: Two hybrids from the same parent but from different hatches.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Two hybrids from the same parent but from different hatches.
